verses.verse: And the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, set <S%H7760><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%> toward Gog <S%H1463><s%>, of the land <S%H776><s%> of Magog <S%H4031><s%>, the prince <S%H5387><s%> of Rosh <S%H7218><s%>, Meshech <S%H4902><s%>, and Tubal <S%H8422><s%>, and prophesy against him <S%H5012><s%>,

and say <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: Behold <S%H1463><s%>, I am against thee, O Gog, prince <S%H7218><s%> of Rosh <S%H7218><s%>, Meshech <S%H4902><s%>, and Tubal <S%H8422><s%>:

and I will turn thee about <S%H7725><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> hooks <S%H2397><s%> into thy jaws <S%H3895><s%>, and I will bring thee forth <S%H3318><s%>, and all thine army <S%H2428><s%>, horses <S%H5483><s%> and horsemen <S%H6571><s%>, all of them clothed <S%H3847><s%> in full <S%H4358><s%> armor <S%H7227><s%>, a great company <S%H6951><s%> with buckler <S%H6793><s%> and shield <S%H4043><s%>, all of them handling <S%H8610><s%> swords <S%H2719><s%>;
Persia <S%H6539><s%>, Cush <S%H3568><s%>, and Put <S%H6316><s%> with them <S%H4043><s%>, all of them with shield and helmet <S%H3553><s%>;

Gomer <S%H1586><s%>, and all his hordes <S%H102><s%>; the house <S%H1004><s%> of Togarmah <S%H8425><s%> in the uttermost parts <S%H3411><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%>, and all his hordes <S%H102><s%>; even many <S%H7227><s%> peoples with thee <S%H5971><s%>.
Be thou prepared <S%H3559><s%>, yea <S%H3559><s%>, prepare thyself <S%H6951><s%>, thou, and all thy companies that are assembled <S%H6950><s%> unto thee <S%H4929><s%>, and be thou a guard unto them.

After many <S%H7227><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> thou shalt be visited <S%H6485><s%>: in the latter <S%H319><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> thou shalt come <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> that is brought back <S%H7725><s%> from the sword <S%H2719><s%>, that is gathered <S%H6908><s%> out of many <S%H7227><s%> peoples <S%H5971><s%>, upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, which have been a continual <S%H8548><s%> waste <S%H2723><s%>; but it is brought forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the peoples <S%H5971><s%>, and they shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> securely <S%H983><s%>, all of them.

And thou shalt ascend <S%H5927><s%>, thou shalt come <S%H935><s%> like a storm <S%H7722><s%>, thou shalt be like a cloud <S%H6051><s%> to cover <S%H3680><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, thou <S%H102><s%>, and all thy hordes, and many <S%H7227><s%> peoples with thee <S%H5971><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: It shall come to pass in that day <S%H3117><s%>, that things <S%H1697><s%> shall come <S%H5927><s%> into thy mind <S%H3824><s%>, and thou shalt devise <S%H2803><s%> an evil <S%H7451><s%> device <S%H4284><s%>:

and thou shalt say <S%H559><s%>, I will go up <S%H5927><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of unwalled villages <S%H6519><s%>; I will go <S%H935><s%> to them that are at rest <S%H8252><s%>, that dwell <S%H3427><s%> securely <S%H983><s%>, all of them dwelling <S%H3427><s%> without walls <S%H2346><s%>, and having neither bars <S%H1280><s%> nor gates <S%H1817><s%>;

to take <S%H7997><s%> the spoil <S%H7998><s%> and to take <S%H962><s%> the prey <S%H957><s%>; to turn <S%H7725><s%> thy hand <S%H3027><s%> against the waste places <S%H2723><s%> that are now inhabited <S%H3427><s%>, and against the people <S%H5971><s%> that are gathered <S%H622><s%> out of the nations <S%H1471><s%>, that have gotten <S%H6213><s%> cattle <S%H4735><s%> and goods <S%H7075><s%>, that dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the middle <S%H2872><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.

Sheba <S%H7614><s%>, and Dedan <S%H1719><s%>, and the merchants <S%H5503><s%> of Tarshish <S%H8659><s%>, with all the young lions <S%H3715><s%> thereof <S%H559><s%>, shall say unto thee <S%H935><s%>, Art thou come to take <S%H7997><s%> the spoil <S%H7998><s%>? hast thou assembled <S%H6950><s%> thy company <S%H6951><s%> to take <S%H962><s%> the prey <S%H957><s%>? to carry away <S%H5375><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold <S%H2091><s%>, to take away <S%H3947><s%> cattle <S%H4735><s%> and goods <S%H7075><s%>, to take <S%H7997><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> spoil <S%H7998><s%>?

Therefore <S%H1121><s%>, son of man <S%H120><s%>, prophesy <S%H5012><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto Gog <S%H1463><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>: In that day <S%H3117><s%> when my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> dwelleth <S%H3427><s%> securely <S%H983><s%>, shalt thou not know it <S%H3045><s%>?

And thou shalt come <S%H935><s%> from thy place <S%H4725><s%> out of the uttermost parts <S%H3411><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%>, thou <S%H7227><s%>, and many peoples <S%H5971><s%> with thee <S%H7392><s%>, all of them riding upon horses <S%H5483><s%>, a great <S%H1419><s%> company <S%H6951><s%> and a mighty <S%H7227><s%> army <S%H2428><s%>;

and thou shalt come up <S%H5927><s%> against my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, as a cloud <S%H6051><s%> to cover <S%H3680><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>: it shall come to pass in the latter <S%H319><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, that I will bring <S%H935><s%> thee against my land <S%H776><s%>, that the nations <S%H1471><s%> may know <S%H3045><s%> me <S%H6942><s%>, when I shall be sanctified in thee <S%H1463><s%>, O Gog, before their eyes <S%H5869><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: Art thou he of whom I spake <S%H1696><s%> in old <S%H6931><s%> time <S%H3117><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> my servants <S%H5650><s%> the prophets <S%H5030><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that prophesied <S%H5012><s%> in those days <S%H3117><s%> for many years <S%H8141><s%> that I would bring thee against them <S%H935><s%>?

And it shall come to pass in that day <S%H3117><s%>, when <S%H3117><s%> Gog <S%H1463><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> against the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>, that my wrath <S%H2534><s%> shall come up <S%H5927><s%> into my nostrils <S%H639><s%>.

For in my jealousy <S%H7068><s%> and in the fire <S%H784><s%> of my wrath <S%H5678><s%> have I spoken <S%H1696><s%>, Surely in that day <S%H3117><s%> there shall be a great <S%H1419><s%> shaking <S%H7494><s%> in the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>;

so that the fishes <S%H1709><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the heavens <S%H8064><s%>, and the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>, and all creeping things <S%H7431><s%> that creep <S%H7430><s%> upon the earth <S%H127><s%>, and all the men <S%H120><s%> that are upon the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%>, shall shake <S%H7493><s%> at my presence <S%H6440><s%>, and the mountains <S%H2022><s%> shall be thrown down <S%H2040><s%>, and the steep places <S%H4095><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%>, and every wall <S%H2346><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> to the ground <S%H776><s%>.

And I will call <S%H7121><s%> for a sword <S%H2719><s%> against him unto all my mountains <S%H2022><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: every man <S%H376><s%>'s sword <S%H2719><s%> shall be against his brother <S%H251><s%>.

And with pestilence <S%H1698><s%> and with blood <S%H1818><s%> will I enter into judgment <S%H8199><s%> with him <S%H4305><s%>; and I will rain upon him <S%H102><s%>, and upon his hordes, and upon the many <S%H7227><s%> peoples <S%H5971><s%> that are with him <S%H7857><s%>, an overflowing shower <S%H1653><s%>, and great hailstones <S%H417><s%>, fire <S%H784><s%>, and brimstone <S%H1614><s%>.

And I will magnify <S%H1431><s%> myself <S%H6942><s%>, and sanctify myself <S%H3045><s%>, and I will make myself known in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%>; and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
